title: Deshaun Watson, the Mac-pocalypse, and Trevor Lawrence to the Jags
description:
Kevin and Nora start by talking about what we know so far about the Deshaun Watson lawsuits and discussing the 'Sports Illustrated' piece by Jenny Vrentas detailing one woman's experience with Watson (0:50). Then they discuss the rise of Mac Jones (14:36), Urban Meyer saying picking Trevor Lawrence is “the direction we're going," and more (33:12).
Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
